Package com.intellij.openapi.editor.impl

Class LineSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.openapi.editor.impl.LineSet

  • public class LineSet
extends java.lang.Object
    Data structure specialized for working with document text lines, i.e. stores information about line mapping to document offsets and provides convenient ways to work with that information like retrieving target line by document offset etc.

    Immutable.
